Climate change also impacts the resilience of natural habitats, and can harm the natural biodiversity of the boroughâ€™s green and blue spaces. Adaptation and mitigation must be a crucial consideration in planning and development, to ensure that development in Tower Hamlets will not adversely affect, but rather improve, climate resilience within the borough and London as a whole.
